name: Moisture Mode Hair Hydration Routine Set
about: What it is:A set that gives the gift of hydration, featuring a full sizes of Hydro Rush Intense Moisture Shampoo, Conditioner, and Dream Routine Overnight Treatment..Hair Texture:Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Intensely hydrates.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Helps plump up dry hair by attracting moisture..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Indulge in holiday hair delights with a moisturizing routine set that boosts hydration for up to 72 hours. In the shower, start with Hydro Rush Intense Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner to gently cleanse and boost moisture. Follow up with Dream Routine Overnight Hydration Treatment for intensely hydrated hair by morning. Infused with squalane, hyaluronic acid, blue algae, and coconut water, this trio of hydrating hair must-haves reduces breakage, intensely moisturizes, and provides long-lasting hydration..Fragrance Description:An intoxicating blend of warm vanilla, spicy sweet clover, and fresh citrus..Clinical Results:In a clinical test of the trio, where the shampoo and conditioner were tested together separate from the hair mask, results showed:.This Set Contains:- 9.2 oz/ 275 mL Hydro rush Intense Moisture Shampoo (full size).Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments,¬†including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Hydro Rush Intense Moisture Shampoo:.-Massage a quarter-size amount into your hands..-Then lather through fully wet hair, focusing on the roots. .-Rinse..-Double cleanse. The first time to cleanse, and the second time to reap all the benefits this shampoo has to offer. .-Fully rinse out...Hydro Rush Intense Moisture Conditioner:.-Squeeze excess water out of hair before applying from mid-lengths to ends. .-Use the comb to detangle and evenly disperse product. .-Let it sit for two to three minutes. .-Rinse..-Shower off with cool water to seal in moisture and close the cuticle...Dream Routine Overnight Hydration Treatment: .-Pump one to four pumps into hands depending on hair length and thickness. .-For fine or thin hair, use one to two pumps. .-For medium or shoulder length hair, use two to three pumps. .-For thick or curly hair, use three to four pumps..-Apply to dry or damp hair before bedtime..-Distribute from mid-lengths to ends‚Äîyou‚Äôre ready for your beauty sleep... reviews.review_text: I adore this product. I have fine, short hair that almost refuses to grow and shows breakage after I curl my hair once. This product is very hydrating, but doesn't weigh my hair down. If you're looking for a product to bring your curls and natural shine back to your hair, this product is for you. If you're looking for a product that will do similar things but bring more volume to your hair, I would gear more towards the normcore line.

While I love this shampoo and conditioner and wanted to try the overnight mask out, when I first ordered this set the mask that is in a glass container arrived shattered and with product and glass shards spilled in the whole box. When customer service sent me another one of these sets the same thing happened again where the overnight mask arrived shattered and with product spilled everywhere, unsalvagable. Not putting any protective packing materials inside of the cardboard box that the products are packaged in and letting a glass hair product have plenty of room to move around while being shipped across the country is quite shocking considering the cost of these products and the fact that this is an online only purchase. While I would recommend purchasing these products individually, do not buy this online-only set because you may receive a damaged hair mask.
